noData.tip: You don't have any NFT collaterals.
You don't have any NFTs in the wallet.

tips.healthFactor: The health factor represents the safety of your loan derived from the proportion of NFT collateral value versus amount borrowed. Keep it above 1 to avoid liquidation.
tips.floorPrice: Floor price is the lowest price for collection items, rather than the average item price, and is updated in real-time.
tips.liquidationPrice: Collateral floor price at which your position will be liquidated.
tips.collateralValue: Value of the NFT collateral deposited in your position.
tips.totalBorrowed: Currently total borrowed in your position.
tips.availableToBorrow: Loan value borrowable given the collateral deposited.
tips.ltv: The Loan to Value (LTV) ratio defines the maximum amount of loan assets that can be borrowed with a specific NFT collateral.
tips.liquidationFee: This is the discount a liquidator gets when buying NFT collateral flagged for liquidation.
